name: Tigran Petrosian
subtitle: World Chess Champion
bio: Tigran Petrosian was a Soviet and Armenian chess player, the 10th World Chess Champion, known for his defensive and strategic style of play.

name: Yuri Vardanyan
subtitle: Olympic champion and world record holder in weightlifting
bio: Yuri Vardanyan was a Soviet Armenian weightlifter, Olympic champion and multiple world record holder in weightlifting.

name: Artur Aleksanyan
subtitle: Olympic champion in Greco-Roman wrestling
bio: Artur Aleksanyan is an Armenian Greco-Roman wrestler, Olympic champion and multiple-time World and European champion.
